title: Sometimes It Happens
description: Cheating has consequences in this sparkly and humorous romance from the author of Two-Way Street and One Night That Changes Everything .Hannah’s about to start her senior year, and she’s never been so scared. That’s because she’s going to have to      1. the guy who dumped her on the last day of junior year.     2. the guy she’s totally fallen for.     3. Noah’s girlfriend...and Hannah’s best friend.     As Hannah tries to figure out how she got herself into this colossal mess, one thing becomes crystal there’s absolutely no way she’s going to make it through this day in one piece.
author: Lauren Barnholdt
